mutants.code:
import re

def entrance(word):
    word = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', word.lower())
    return word != word[::-1]

import re

def entrance(word):
    word = re.sub('', '', word.lower())
    return word == word[::-1]

import re

def entrance(word):
    word = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', 'MUTATED', word.lower())
    return word == word[::-1]

import re

def entrance(word):
    word = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', word.lower())
    return word == word[::+1]

import re

def entrance(word):
    word = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', word.lower())
    return word == word[::-2]

import re

def entrance(word):
    word = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', word.lower())
    return word == word[::-0]

import re

def entrance(word):
    word = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', word.lower())
    return word == word[::-0]

import re

def entrance(word):
    word = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', word.lower())
    return word == word[::--1]
